resources.string: Welcome to the Purdue Automated Tour Guide! Swipe the screen left or right to change options. Press the screen to select the current option.
Swipe left or right to cycle through the settings options. Press the screen to toggle an option on or off.
Press the screen to proceed to

This unit is designed to provide high level information about the Purdue University campus. Buildings. Streets. And cross walks. The device will attempt to lead the user on a preprogrammed tour around the university campus. It is the user s job to physically navigate between the programmed points of interest. While avoiding collisions with vehicles. Pedestrians. Bicycles. And other obstacles. The device is not designed to provide navigational information while inside a building. Since the accuracy of the unit relies on GPS technology. The user will be warned if the GPS signal is lost. Likewise. The user will be notified. When the GPS signal has been re-acquired.
You are now at the main screen.
You are now at the settings screen.
You are now at the route selection screen.
You are now navigating on route
